thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE Thriftbooks! I tell everyone I know about it. It is my absolute GO TO place when I need a book, no matter how new the book is, because they almost always have it! The last several books I purchased were so brand new, I couldn't believe it. I was hoping to give one as a gift and it was in perfect condition. I only paid a fraction of what I would have at the store....LOVE this website!!!
